languages.text: {n}Вы видели такие взгляды у ветеранов — так выглядят не зажившие шрамы болезненных воспоминаний. В одиночку такое не преодолеть, необходима помощь: либо напарник, либо достаточно сильный эмоциональный стимул.{/n}

{n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы видели такие взгляды у ветеранов — так выглядят не зажившие шрамы болезненных воспоминаний. В одиночку такое не преодолеть, необходима помощь: либо напарник, либо достаточно сильный эмоциональный стимул.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of veterans. The look of painful memories that leave behind deep scars. One cannot overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}

{n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez déjà aperçu ce regard dans les yeux d'autres vétérans par le passé. C'est l'expression reconnaissable entre toutes d'un individu marqué à jamais par des souvenirs si douloureux qu'ils vous hantent jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. Le genre de traumatisme qu'on ne surmonte pas seul, sans un partenaire ou, peut-être, quelque stimulus émotionnel particulièrement intense.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez déjà aperçu ce regard dans les yeux d'autres vétérans par le passé. C'est l'expression reconnaissable entre toutes d'un individu marqué à jamais par des souvenirs si douloureux qu'ils vous hantent jusqu'à la fin de vos jours. Le genre de traumatisme qu'on ne surmonte pas seul, sans un partenaire ou, peut-être, quelque stimulus émotionnel particulièrement intense.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Has visto esa misma mirada en los ojos de otros veteranos. Es la expresión de alguien que vuelve a vivir recuerdos dolorosos que han dejado cicatrices profundas. No pueden superar una experiencia así en solitario; necesitan ayuda, o un compañero, o, quizá, un estímulo emocional fuerte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Has visto esa misma mirada en los ojos de otros veteranos. Es la expresión de alguien que vuelve a vivir recuerdos dolorosos que han dejado cicatrices profundas. No pueden superar una experiencia así en solitario; necesitan ayuda, o un compañero, o, quizá, un estímulo emocional fuerte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你以前在其他老兵的目光中看到过类似的表情，这表明当下的情境激发了他们很久以前的创伤。他们没办法靠自己来克服这种创伤，需要他人帮助。或许是一位伙伴，或许是某种强烈的情感刺激。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你以前在其他老兵的目光中看到过类似的表情，这表明当下的情境激发了他们很久以前的创伤。他们没办法靠自己来克服这种创伤，需要他人帮助。或许是一位伙伴，或许是某种强烈的情感刺激。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他のベテランの、似たような表情を見たことがある。それは、深い傷跡を残した辛い記憶を追体験している人の表情だ。そのようなトラウマを克服するためには、自分一人では望めない。助け、あるいはパートナー、あるいは強い感情的刺激が必要なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他のベテランの、似たような表情を見たことがある。それは、深い傷跡を残した辛い記憶を追体験している人の表情だ。そのようなトラウマを克服するためには、自分一人では望めない。助け、あるいはパートナー、あるいは強い感情的刺激が必要なのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast diesen Blick in den Augen anderer Veteranen schon öfter gesehen. Es ist der Blick von jemandem, der schmerzhafte Erinnerungen durchlebt, welche tiefe Wunden hinterlassen haben. Ein solches Trauma kann man nicht allein überwinden, man braucht Hilfe oder einen Partner oder vielleicht einen starken emotionalen Reiz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu bakışı daha önce başka kıdemli subayların gözünde de görmüştün. Geride derin yaralar bırakmış, acı dolu anılarını tekrar yaşayan birinin yüz ifadesi bu. Böylesi travmaların tek başlarına üstesinden gelmek umutların da ötesindedir. Bu tür kişilerin yardıma, bir partnere ya da belki de güçlü bir duygusal uyarıcıya ihtiyaçları olur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have seen that look before in the eyes of other veterans. It's the expression of someone reliving painful memories that have left behind deep scars. They cannot hope to overcome such trauma on their own — they would need help, or a partner, or, perhaps, some strong emotional stimulus.{/n}
